summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3540, for the improvement of the alley in block 18, A.A. Denny's Addition, between 5th Avenue and 6th Avenue, from Pike Street to Pine Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43739 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
